short_summary: Request for Information - Patent Annuity Service Provider
description: The overall goal of this Request for Information (RFI) is to engage industry and its suppliers to assemble information in regards to services of a patent annuity provider capable of managing and paying maintenance fees (also referred to as annuities or renewal fees) for patents and patent applications on behalf of the NRC.
duration_in_months: There is not/not specify the duration of this contract.",
full_summary:
*****

**Request for Information - Patent Annuity Service Provider**
=========================================================

**Reference Number**: cb-596-2865113
**Amendment Number**: 5
**Solicitation Number**: 24-58033
**Publication Date**: 2024-06-05
**Tender Closing Date**: 2024-07-05T14:00:00
**Expected Contract Start Date**: 2025-02-03
**Expected Contract End Date**: 2026-02-02

**Note:** The tender for this Request for Information (RFI) has expired.

**Introduction**
---------------
The National Research Council of Canada is seeking information from industry and its suppliers regarding services of a patent annuity provider capable of managing and paying maintenance fees for patents and patent applications on behalf of the NRC.

**Tender Details**
----------------

* **UNSPSC Classification**: 
  * 64141501: International patent
  * 64141601: Nation-based patent
* **Procurement Category**: SRV
* **Notice Type**: Request for Information
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Not applicable

**Participation Opportunities**
------------------------------

* The tender is open to all qualified suppliers worldwide.
* The services will be delivered within Canada.

**Trade Agreements**
------------------

This tender may be subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

**Contact Information**
----------------------

* Annette Driscoll, Contracting Officer
* Phone: (506) 377-9104
* Email: [annette.driscoll@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:annette.driscoll@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)
* Address: 100 Francophonie Road, Moncton, New Brunswick, Canada
